data.message:
https://www.facebook.com/SlimShadyOfficialPage1 

This NUT job is posing as you has other pages ... Take this f*** to the cleaners ! He's letting thousands of ppl believe they're going to get money or a car, not that it's something that would be on your to do list.. This is so wrong, I can't put a stop to it ! Maybe you can ! Anyways merry Christmas, you've always inspired me  <3 NOW will the real slim shady please man up!
